page.title: 05Interview with B & Q Manager
page.content:
Sample of Questions and Answers
1. Which is the busiest, the garden centre or the D.I.Y centre ? The garden centre is busiest March to June. The D.I.Y centre is busiest September to February. 2. What happens if you have stock you cannot sell ? The goods are reduced in price. 3. What do you do about customers complaints ? We try to be sympathetic & polite otherwise the custom is lost. 4. Do you enjoy your job ? It is a demanding job; sometimes exciting, but can be boring in the Winter with little stock coming in and fewer customers. 5. How many are employed in B & Q ? There are 36 employees.
